text: Mahinaharula'i agadiâ€“pachadi parnu kuphrama e'uta brd'dhi ho, jasabata tiniharu margavicalanama parchan jun kaphira hun. Kunai varsa uniharule tyasala'i vaidha thahara'umchan ra kunai varsa tyasala'i avaidha thahara'umdachan taki allahaka mahinaharuko sankhya pura garihalun, ra yasaprakara allahale avaidha gari'ekola'i vaidha thahara'ihalun. Uniharuka aphna naramra karma ramra lagdachan ra allaha inkara garneharula'i sojho marga dekha'umdaina
